channel.title: Only 1 summoned npc at a time

item.title: Only 1 summoned npc at a time
item.dc:creator: @x19 x19
item.description:
@x19 wrote:

if(npcSummon = true)
{
sendMessage(“you already have one summoned”);
}else{
summonNpcMethod();
}

And in your summon npc method, right after where it summons it put, npcSummon = true, and declare the boolean npcSummon.

Read full topic
item.source: Only 1 summoned npc at a time

item.title: Only 1 summoned npc at a time
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

well ive got this:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("summonman") && playerRights >= 1) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(1, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(10), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; sendMessage("You summon a man."); }
but i want to make it so you can only summon 1 npc at a time, How do i make this?
